title: 19 Years After Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam, Sanjay Leela Bhansali & Salman Khan To Reunite For A Love Story
text:
There are a few tried and tested formulas in Bollywood that never fail. Like, some actor-director collaborations raise up the curiosity and expectations among people and for all the right reasons. One such news got confirmed today.
19 years after the massive success of their film Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam, Salman Khan and Sanjay Leela Bhansali are all set to reunite for a love-story.
Twitter
The news was announced on social media by trade analyst Taran Adarsh. In his tweet he revealed that the film will go on the floors very soon. In his tweet, he wrote:
#BreakingNews: Sanjay Leela Bhansali & Salman Khan reunite after 19 year for a love story... The film is set to go on floors soon. — taran adarsh (@taran_adarsh) February 23, 2019
Bhansali and Salman are a dream team as after their 1999 hit film Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam, Salman also appeared in a guest appearance in Saawariya.
